text:
It’s obvious that @JoeBiden’s only campaign strategy is to politicize the coronavirus pandemic and weaponize it against @realDonaldTrump.

Looks like China and Russia are on board with Team Biden’s message too.
https://t.co/SUr2ccmpdi
